# init(textAttachment:parentView:textLayoutManager:location:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new text attachment view whose content starts at the location you provide.

## Declaration

```swift
init(textAttachment: NSTextAttachment, parentView: UIView?, textLayoutManager: NSTextLayoutManager?, location: any NSTextLocation)
```

## Parameters

- **textAttachment**: The [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSTextAttachment] for this view.
- **parentView**: The parent view of this attachment.
- **textLayoutManager**: The [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSTextLayoutManager] for this view.
- **location**: The [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSTextLocation] that identifies the start of the text.
